entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 23.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud near noon. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 23. Wind chill minus 41 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:30 AM EST Sunday 15 January 2023
